name: Gin Fizz
description: It’s not called a fizz for nothing. Shake this drink like mad for optimal effervescence.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add lemon juice, sugar and gin. Shake vigorously and strain into a highball glass. Top with club soda and garnish with a wedge of lemon.

video.name: Gin Fizz
video.description: How to make a gin fizz. Shake it like mad for optimal effervescence.
